name: 60% Arabica - 40% Robusta- Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
• The Bababudangiri Range in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka is renowned as the birthplace of India's coffee. Indulge in a true farm-to-cup experience with this distinguished AA Grade specialty coffee beans, cultivated in the region's lush and rolling hills at high elevations (4500 to 5000 feet). 
    • FLAVOUR NOTES: This particular blend gets its layered and nuanced flavours from the Arabica beans, with the Robusta beans adding the right amount of brightness and acidity.
    • DRINKING PREFERENCES: Best enjoyed black. Great for brewing an Espresso, Ristretto, or Cortado.
    • Our 1 kg and 5 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet.
